pages.text: About ABOUT US Our kind and attentive restaurant team will remind you what it feels like to enjoy a night out filled with delicious food and exceptional service. We take pride in providing a superior one of a kind dining experience. Possessing a wide range of industry experience, and extensive food & wine knowledge, our front of the house staff will give a strong effort to ensure you enjoy yourself at Marco Prime Steaks & Seafood. We serve people the same way we would want to be served. Our Accolades Wine spectator Award of Excellence 2023 2022 2020 2018 2017 2016 2015 2014 Marco Prime in the Press "FISH, TO TASTE RIGHT, MUST SWIM 3 TIMES - IN WATER, IN BUTTER, AND IN WINE." CHEF Roberto Rocha With an illustrious career marked by culinary excellence, Chef Roberto Rocha brings his passion for colorful cuisine back to Marco Prime as the Executive Chef, reinvigorating the restaurant's offerings with his expertise and innovative flair. Known for his creative interpretations and dedication to authenticity and quality, Chef Rocha's return to Marco Prime heralds a new chapter in the restaurant's culinary narrative. His commitment to sourcing the finest ingredients, combined with a deep understanding of Peruvian cooking techniques, promises an elevated dining experience for patrons seeking a fusion of tradition and innovation on their plates. His cullinary journey started at the age of 25 when he immersed himself in learning everything he could about cuisine and preparations; reading books and finding recipes online. Chef Roberto started working with the Carvelli Restaurant Group in 2007 where he studied under Chef Francesco Carvelli. This experience allowed him to practice what he was reading in the kitchen, and the Carvelli Resturant Group pushed him to become a better chef by enabling him to take classes and receive formal training. His dedication and talent earned him a prominent role at Tanta, a celebrated Peruvian restaurant in Chicago, where he honed his skills under the tutelage of renowned chefs, mastering the artistry of fine dining. As Executive Chef at Marco Prime, Chef Roberto Rocha's return signifies an exciting new era, where his culinary mastery promises to tantalize taste buds and create memorable dining experiences for patrons seeking a harmonious blend of sophistication and authenticity in every dish. Marco Prime is consistently voted one of the best restaurants in Marco Island. What our patrons have to say What our patrons have to say Ed W. 2 year ago Down in Marco for the week and couldn't wait to dine at MP for our anniversary. When I started reading recent reviews, I got a little nervous thinking maybe it had gone downhill since last visit 5 years ago. What are people talking about?? We were not at all disappointed. We started with the delicious wagyu meatballs paired with a Riesling and Pinot Noir. Bread was great and had a tasty butter with it. My wife and daughter ordered the petit filets and both said it was the best steaks they ever had in their lives. Both finished every bite and I took down a 20oz boneless ribeye. I like my creamed spinach a little more creamed, but it was still good. Also had some truffle fries on the side. Server (Eastern European accent) was fantastic but I didn't catch his name. First Friday of Lent (oops). ... Oscar Rojas 2 year ago Marco Steak House deserves its excellent reputation for fine dining and special occasions. My wife and I celebrated our wedding anniversary there last night, and everything was perfect. The food is delectable, earning a solid 4 stars. We shared a Sliced 14oz Wagyu N.y. Strip Steak which was cooked to tender perfection and bursting with flavor. But where Marco's really shines is the service and ambiance, both of which merit a perfect 5 stars. Our server Leo could not have been more attentive. He knew it was our anniversary and went above and beyond to make it special, surprising us with a decadent chocolate dessert on the house. What amazing attention to detail! The atmosphere is elegant and romantic, with soft lighting, white tablecloths, and fresh flowers on every table. For a memorable dining experience in a classy yet comfortable environment, Marco's Steak House is a fantastic choice. We will certainly be returning to celebrate future anniversaries. Thanks Marco's for helping make our special evening so delightful! ... Oscar R. 2 year ago Marco Steak House deserves its excellent reputation for fine dining and special occasions. My wife and I celebrated our wedding anniversary there last ... Andreina Fontes 2 year ago Excellent food and service. We order everything the waiter recommended and everything was amazing. The sea-bass, the salmon and the filet mignon Definitely one of my favorites restaurants ... sheila gonzalez 2 year ago The food was amazing. The service was also great. The environment was very pleasant. Totally recommended; additionally my daughter forgot her purse. And they kindly saved it and returned it the weekend after. Nice people, nice place. ... Teresa Pedersen 2 year ago Party of 8 and all steaks were perfect. The filet was tender like butter. The wait staff was helpful & never far away. ... Lisa Byrne 2 year ago Arslan was an awesome writer Food was delicious and perfect. It was my birthday so they brought out complementary desert. ... Matthew Provenzano 2 year ago Went there spur of the moment. A lot smaller than what we were thinking. The menu was amazing and couldn‚Äôt decide on our entreees. The server, Nate, pointed us in the right direction. Every recommendation was spot on. The service was great and the food very good. I got the sea bass (normally a steak guy) and it did not disappoint. Wife got the the petite file and it was cooked to perfection. For the price we couldn‚Äôt have been happier. Will definitely go back next time we are in the area. ... Pat E. 2 year ago Great Happy Hour just get there early. We had been told by the JW Marriott that is was good and to make sure to be there by 4:15, so we did and they were ... Private Events
Private Events at Marco Prime
Host your next private event at Marco Prime on Marco Island, where every occasion is elevated with a customized menu tailored just for you. Whether it‚Äôs a birthday, wedding, corporate outing, or any special gathering, our expert team crafts a unique dining experience that perfectly suits your needs. From intimate parties to grand celebrations, Marco Prime offers exceptional service and unforgettable flavors for all types of events.
